packageJSON.name: remotedev-app
packageJSON.description: Remote Redux DevTools web, electron and chrome app.

scripts.build:electron: rm -rf ./build/electron/ && rm -rf ./build/executables/ && gulp build:electron && gulp pack:electron
scripts.prepublish: eslint ./src/app && npm run test && npm run build && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min

releases.name: Support multiple instances in one connection
v0.6.3
v0.6.1
releases.body:
- Generate non-redux tests.
- Fix monitor actions for multiple instances.
- Don't show dispatcher when there's no monitored instance.
- Autoclean href value for Export button, not to consume memory.

releases.name: v0.6.0
releases.body:
- Use `noSettings` parameter to remove Settings button and dialog (for custom monitor apps where settings are passed via parameters).
- Optimization: State is not relayed twice when starting monitoring.
- Move remote dispatch eval to the client part [#14].
- Different behaviours when the monitored app is not Redux.

releases.name: v0.4.0
releases.body:
### Breaking

Remove `redux-devtools-diff-monitor`.

### Style improving

Now use `material-ui` instead of `react-desctop`.

### Fixes
- Prevent dispatching empty actions.
- Prevent throwing when socket url is invalid.

releases.name: v0.3.8
releases.body:
- Toggle slider monitor.
- Update monitors.
- Update dependencies for React 15.
- Fix styles.
- Forbid monitors actions for now.

releases.name: v0.3.6
releases.body:
- Added `secure` option to use secure connection (wss) for `remotedev-server`.
- Improved the setting form and buttons.

releases.name: v0.3.5
releases.body:
- Import / export state feature
- Optimizations of the components

releases.name: v0.3.4
releases.body:
- Show all previous history when the app is opened.
- Start / stop relaying changes from the client app (https://github.com/zalmoxisus/remote-redux-devtools/pull/20).
- Show / hide dispatcher monitor.
- Added DiffMonitor.

releases.name: v0.3.3
releases.body:
- Add ability to dispatch actions remotely with Dispatch monitor.
- Add Chart monitor.
- Fixed issues in log and inspect monitors.

releases.name: v0.3.2
releases.body: Support auto committing actions (`maxAge` option).

releases.name: v0.3.1
releases.body: Allow monitors actions to be sent back.

releases.name: v0.3.0
releases.body: Add inspector monitor (#3).

releases.name: v0.2.8
releases.body: Add web build to the npm package, so it can be reused.

releases.name: v0.2.7
releases.body:
- Add UMD build (#2).
- Fixed resizing in slider monitor.

releases.name: v0.2.6
releases.body:
- Fix reconnecting issue when changing settings.
- Add ability not to show the buttons bar.

releases.name: v0.2.5
releases.body: Fix showing partial history (without init action)

releases.name: v0.2.4
releases.body:
- Fix the issues with styles in Chrome 48.
- Update `socketcluster-client` to fix the reconnecting issue.

releases.name: v0.2.3
releases.body:
- Fix removing the last instance from the list.
- Update socketcluster-client.

releases.name: v0.2.2
releases.body:
- Extend store API to get, set and delete instances.
- `updateState`'s parameters like `sync`, `onInstancesChanged` and `instance` are now optional.

releases.name: v0.2.1
releases.body: Added SliderMonitor which dispatch `JUMP_TO_STATE` action with new state. It can be used with any flux application via `remotedev`.

releases.name: v0.2.0
releases.body:
Debug multiple instances simultaneously (for example, on web, android emulator, ios emulator and on the phone):
- List instances.
- Stick to an instance.
- Sync other instances to have the same states as the selected instance.

releases.name: v0.1.2
releases.body: Support multiple instances.

releases.name: v0.1.1
releases.body:
- Reconstruct pure actions.
- Support simultaneous actions.

releases.name: v0.1.0
releases.body: Now works with a local server. Add your `hostname` and `port` on the `Settings` page.

releases.name: v0.0.2
releases.body: Use as a npm module, so you may import `DevTools` from the app.

releases.name: v0.0.1
releases.body: First public release. Web, Electron and Chrome app for monitoring [`remote-redux-devtools`](https://github.com/zalmoxisus/remote-redux-devtools).
